FuncDef: This command configures an accounting policy that can apply to an interface.

ParaDef.Info: The accounting policy-id of an existing policy. Accounting policies record either service (access) or network information. A network accounting policy can only be associated with the network port configurations. Accounting policies are configured in the config>log>accounting-policy context. Values-1 to 99.

ExtraInfo: Default: No accounting policies are specified by default. You must explicitly specify a policy. If configured, the accounting policy configured as the default is used.
